snippet: A summary contains much of what the technology industry wants, like an easier green card route for foreigners educated in math and science.
abstract: Proposed overhaul of immigration law seems to fulfill a wish list for the technology industry, with an easier green card route for foreigners, new visa category for entrepreneurs and more guest workers to be deployed on short-term projects.
lead_paragraph: A summary contains much of what the technology industry wants, like an easier green card route for foreigners educated in math and science.

headline.seo: Tech Sector Seen as Benefiting in Immigration Bill
headline.main: Migrant Bill Seems to Fit Tech Sector Wish List
headline.print_headline: Migrant Bill Seems to Fit Tech Sector Wish List
